summary.span: 表示 中选定项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of selected items in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在中存储所选的项 。The class stores the selected items in the . 存储在中的项 是类中包含的项 。The items stored in the are items contained within the class. 类存储中显示的所有项 。The class stores all items displayed in the . 下表是一个示例，说明如何在 示例中存储的项以及 其选择状态 。The following table is an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states within an example . |索引Index|ItemItem|列表框中的选择状态Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |00|object1object1|未选定Unselected| |11|b jobject2|选定Selected| |22|object3object3|未选定Unselected| |33|object4object4|选定Selected| |44|object5object5|选定Selected| 根据 上表中所示，下表演示了 将如何显示。Based on the demonstrated in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ObjectCollection 中的选定项Selected item from ObjectCollection| |-----------|-----------------------------------------| |00|b jobject2| |11|object4object4| |22|object5object5| 您可以使用此类的属性和方法来使用集合执行各种任务。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 使用 方法可以确定类中的项是否为的 成员 。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the . 一旦您知道该项位于集合中，就可以使用 方法来确定的中的特定项在中的 存储位置 。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where a specific item within the for the is stored within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以确定类中的项是否 是中存储的选定项的成员 。The method enables you to determine whether an item from the class is a member of the selected items stored in the . 您可以使用此选项来确定是否选择多重选择中的特定项 。You can use this to determine if a specific item in a multiple-selection is selected.

summary.span: 获取集合中的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您可以确定中的选定项的数目 。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the . 然后，可以在循环遍历集合的值时使用此值，并且需要提供多个迭代来执行循环。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非将 的属性 设置为 `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` 或，否则 `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` ，此属性始终返回 (0) 或 (1) 的值，具体取决于是否具有选定的项。Unless the property of the is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item.
